physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Left-side forearm edema, olecranon bursitis, and tenosynovitis. Ulcerated lesions on arms and legs.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially, the patient had no significant findings until the worsening of pain and swelling, leading to nodular lesions that began to ulcerate over time.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Biopsy revealed Sporothrix schenckii infection; hand and arm lesions began to ulcerate.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Worsening of lesions on hands and legs requiring extensive debridement.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Continued development of new nodular lesions on extremities.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Progressively worsening lesions although treatment was initiated.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Progressive improvement of the lesions following appropriate antifungal therapy.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: There was progressive improvement of lesions after initiation of treatment with amphotericin B and itraconazole.
